blocks.name: ccatws1cl

blocks.name: ccats1alpha

  simpr(c3 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà c1)
  3eltr4d(c2, (0[..^](# `(c0[++]<" c3 ">))), (# ` c0), (0[..^]((# ` c0)[+]1)), ((c0 ‚àà Word(c1)‚àß(# ` c0)= c2)‚àß(c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1)))
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà Word(c1), (# ` c0)= c2, (c3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c1), (# ` c0)‚àà(0[..^]((# ` c0)[+]1)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Word(c1), (# ` c0)‚àà(0[..^]((# ` c0)[+]1)), (# ` c0)‚àà ‚Ñï0)

blocks.name: ccatw2s1p2
blocks.content: Extract the second of two single symbols concatenated with a word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ccatw2s1p2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), co(c2, caddc, nat1)), c4))
} = {
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), co(c2, caddc, nat1)), c4), wcel(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cword(c1)), wcel(c4, c1), wceq(co(c2, caddc, nat1), cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)))))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cword(c1)))
  ccatws1cl(c0, c1, c3)
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  eqtr2d(co(c2, caddc, nat1), cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3))), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3))), co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1)))
  ccatws1len(c0, c1, c3)
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wceq(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), co(c2, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(cfv(chash, c0), c2, caddc, nat1)
  ccats1val2(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), c1, c4, co(c2, caddc, nat1))

blocks.name: ccat2s1fvw
blocks.content: Extract a symbol of a word from the concatenation of the word with two single symbols. (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2020.)

thm ccat2s1fvw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), c2), cfv(c0, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), c2), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(co(c0, cconcat, co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))), c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  fveq1d(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), c2, co(c0, cconcat, co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, cconcat, cs1(c3)), cconcat, cs1(c4)), co(c0, cconcat, co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4)))), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(c4, c1))
  simpr(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  ccatw2s1ass(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cconcat, co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4))), c2), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4)), cword(c1)), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wcel(co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4)), cword(c1)))
  ccat2s1cl(c3, c1, c4)
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), w3a(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  mpand(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  nn0ge0(c2)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cr))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  nn0red(c2, wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cr))
  nn0red(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))
  lencl(c0, c1)
  lelttr(nat0, c2, cfv(chash, c0))
  elnnnn0b(cfv(chash, c0))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c2, clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  elfzo0(c2, cfv(chash, c0))
  ccatval1(c0, c1, co(cs1(c3), cconcat, cs1(c4)), c2)
}
